scripts.graph-local-clean: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose rm -v && rm -rf data/ipfs data/postgres
scripts.deploy-local-pow: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 dump-pow --network pow
scripts.deploy-local-pos: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 dump-pow-pos --network pos
scripts.build-create-deploy-pow: yarn build-pow && yarn create-local-pow && yarn deploy-local-pow
scripts.build-create-deploy-pos: yarn build-pos && yarn create-local-pos && yarn deploy-local-pos
